title: @RiotRepertoir @Meddler is pantheon going to be one of the fighers which you are going to rework?
body: @RiotRepertoir @Meddler is pantheon going to be one of the fighers which you are going to rework in patch V5.17(or when you are going to rework the fighters)? And also are you going to rework Essence Reaver next patch and make it for example to restore x% max mana and to be builded with similar item, but with less AD?

replies.body:
We don't currently have any changes planned for Pantheon in 5.17 or, to the best of my knowledge 5.18. He's a much more mobile fighter than the juggernauts we've been working on, with some assassin lke qualities, so he wasn't a character we considered for this bundle of work.

Essence Reaver we'll almost certainly change come preseason, still figuring out how however.

> 
> Your auto attacks now restore 1% of your missing mana, this effect is tripled when attacking champions.

Decent mana regen while farming, but great mana regen while trading.

They already tried it.

http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Soul_Sickle

It was not implemented because the mana regeneration passive was too easy to abuse on Udyr, Poppy, and other champions that are only limited by mana gating.

Honestly, a better solution would simply be to make the passive a bit weaker than it is now, with the added benefit of having it trigger with physical damage rather than only auto-attacks. Take the lifesteal away entirely as compensation, as ER will never compete with Bork, Hydra or BT for that stat and lifesteal should NOT be one of the reasons to buy the item anyway. Give it the buildpath of; BF sword, Forbidden Idol. 80 AD, 100% Mana Regen, a passive that can actually be used by AD casters without being abused by attack-speed monsters. You have a niche, usable item that is actually worth a damn on more than 2 characters.

Pantheon's main issue is that he's basically a click 'n burst champion, similar to Talon. You W + E + Q, none of which are skillshots (well, E is a cone, but it's rather easy to hit). His ultimate takes some skill to use though. He should probably either be reworked a bit (turn Q or W into a skillshot, perhaps?) or reworked a lot. Other similar champions should also receive reworks (such as Talon and Xin Zhao). Point 'n click gapcloser combined with point 'n click cc and burst is not great game design, and it's pretty annoying to play against.
